title: cousin-eddie - Alternative Data Intelligence Platform
nextMilestone: Build MVP with 5 signal types for Uber POC
valueProposition: Democratize alternative data trading by building a platform that can ingest 100+ signal types for any public company, giving solo traders the same data edge as hedge funds
targetUser: Solo quantitative traders and small trading shops
mvpScope: Signal processing platform with Uber as POC - SEC filings, hiring data, app metrics, web signals, sentiment analysis
